title: [Health] Study finds link between plastic exposure and cognitive decline in mice: Lachnospiraceae, Alistipes, and Clostridium among the gut bacteria affected

[Medicine] Review of non-invasive brain stimulation in anxiety disorders shows Generalized Anxiety Disorder and Obsessive Compulsive Disorder respond best to low frequency repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation (rTMS), while Posttraumatic Stress Disorder to high frequency rTMS
